author: Moscadini
title: May the 4th be with you
review:
So I went to a Lego Store today to get the Shadow ARF Trooper to find out that I NEEDED to buy a $75 or More Lego Set.  I only wanted to buy the actual figure.  The Store Manager explained to me that each store was only given 100 Figures and that they could not sell them individually.  So, I ended up buying the Slave I just to buy the figure.  The cool part is, you get the Shadow ARF Figure, Poster, and Ice Tray all for Free.

I rate the Shadow ARF Figure: 4 Stars out of 5.  Too bad the face had to be a regular clone trooper face and not something different

author: wander099
title: Promotional
review:
I lucked out with this figure, I was going to order something from S@H next month, but moved it up so I could pick up one of these little guys and I am very impressed.  It is made of quality (i.e. not Chinese) plastic and has detailed printing on its helmet and the front and back of its torso.  He also comes with a gun. 

The only thing I don't like is that its face is a normal clone trooper's face.  But I'm just gong to keep the helmet on so I don't think about that.  Overall, I am very impressed because this is a good free item to get with an order if you are a Star Wars fan and it is limited quantity too.  This figure would make a nice addition to a Star Wars army or one of the larger sets.  I will be adding mine to the Death Star. 

The only way this would not be a good deal is if you bought sets just for the minifigure because you would have had to buy $75 worth.  But if you found something you wanted or were going to buy anyway, this was a great bonus.
